item.name: Attendee
item.description: Handles event attendees, allowing users to register, view, and unregister from events.

variable.description: The ID of the event to register for.

request.description: Allows a user to register for an event, provided they meet the necessary conditions such as not being already registered, not being the organizer, having enough tokens, and being invited if the event is private.

response.body: {"data":{"id":1925,"name":"Et ex consequatur omnis quia velit.","description":"Aliquid dignissimos sunt ipsa est hic. Quas voluptatem unde occaecati quia.","location":"Online","cost":1,"start_date":"2025-07-13 10:00:00","end_date":"2025-08-09 15:00:00","type":"quia","public":"yes","attendees_count":1,"organizer":{"id":7562,"name":"Maureen Eichmann","email":"jarod.block@example.com","country":"Tunisia","profession":"File Clerk","phone":"+1-323-773-9362","organization":"Becker PLC"}},"message":"You have successfully registered for the event."}
{"message": "You can only register to an event before it start."}
{"message": "You are not invited to this event."}
{"message": "You don't have enough tokens to register for this event."}
{"message": "The organizer of this event does not allow you to join the event."}
{"message": "You are already registered for this event."}
{"message": "You can't register to your own event."}

variable.description: The ID of the event to unregister from.
The ID of the user to unregister. If not provided, the authenticated user will be unregistered.

request.description: Allows a user to unregister from an event, provided they are registered and the request is made by the user themselves, the event organizer, or an admin.

response.body: {"message": "You are not registered to this event!"}
{"message": "You are not allowed to unregister this user from the event!"}

query.description: The results are paginated, you will get 20 results per page.
The sorting criteria for the attendees. Default is 'user,asc'.Consisting of two parts, the sorting criteria and the sorting order (asc or desc).
The additional data to include in the response.

variable.description: The ID of the event to retrieve attendees for.

request.description: Shows a paginated list of attendees for a specific event, with optional sorting and additional event data.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Handles user authentication, including login and logout.

request.description: Logs out the authenticated user by deleting their current access token.
Handles user authentication by validating credentials and generating an access token.

variable.description: The ID of the user whose banned list to retrieve. If not specified, retrieves the authenticated user's banned list.

request.description:
List all the users banned by the authenticated user or a specified user.
* Only administrators can view other users' banned lists.

response.body: {"message": "You are not authorized to view this user's banned list."}

request.description: Add users to the authenticated user's banned list.

response.body: {"data":[{"id":7555,"name":"Ms. Audra Crooks II","email":"gulgowski.asia@example.com","country":"Peru","profession":"Glass Blower","phone":"843.428.7432","organization":"Price Ltd"},{"id":7556,"name":"Pearl Hauck Sr.","email":"alayna44@example.org","country":"Saint Vincent and the Grenadines","profession":"Gas Distribution Plant Operator","phone":"870-215-1024","organization":"Leffler-Glover"}],"message":"Bans added successfully."}

request.description: Remove users from the authenticated user's banned list.

item.name: Event Invites
item.description: Handles event invitations, allowing organizers to invite users to private events.

variable.description: The ID of the event for which to retrieve invites.

request.description: Lists all users invited to a private event. You need to be the organizer of the event or an administrator to view the invites.

response.body: {"data":[{"id":7564,"name":"Morgan Hirthe","email":"imclaughlin@example.org","country":"Saint Vincent and the Grenadines","profession":"Gas Distribution Plant Operator","phone":"870-215-1024","organization":"Leffler-Glover"},{"id":7565,"name":"Annette Labadie","email":"kconsidine@example.net","country":"Holy See (Vatican City State)","profession":"Construction Equipment Operator","phone":"+1-678-651-3805","organization":"Cartwright-Balistreri"}]}
{"message": "This event is a public event, there are no invites."}

variable.description: The ID of the event to which users will be invited.

request.description: Allows the organizer of a private event to invite users to the event.

response.body: {"data":[{"id":7566,"name":"Ms. Audra Crooks II","email":"aschuster@example.com","country":"Zambia","profession":"Compacting Machine Operator","phone":"253.392.8862","organization":"McLaughlin, Leuschke and Bauch"},{"id":7567,"name":"Mr. Oswald Koch","email":"bailee15@example.org","country":"Heard Island and McDonald Islands","profession":"Chemical Plant Operator","phone":"531-539-0170","organization":"Gaylord, Hettinger and Nitzsche"}],"message":"Invites created successfully."}
{"message": "You are not authorized to invite users to this event."}
{"message": "You cannot invite users to an event that has already started."}
{"message": "You can only invite users to private events."}

variable.description: The ID of the event from which users will be removed.

request.description: Allows the organizer of a private event to remove invites for users.

item.name: Event Types
item.description: Handles event types, allowing administrators to create, update, and delete event types.

request.description: Creates a new event type. Only administrators can create event types.

response.body: {"data":{"id":1078,"name":"sunt","description":"Accusantium harum mollitia modi deserunt aut ab."}}

request.description: Updates an existing event type. Only administrators can update event types.

response.body: {"data":{"id":1079,"name":"nihil","description":"Harum mollitia modi deserunt aut ab provident perspiciatis quo."}}

request.description:
Deletes an event type. A type cannot be deleted if it is used by any event.
Only administrators can delete event types.

response.body: {"message": "Cannot delete event type that is in use!"}

request.description: Lists all available event types.

response.body: {"data":[{"id":1089,"name":"saepe","description":"Rem voluptatem tenetur totam laborum."},{"id":1090,"name":"officiis","description":"Quia eligendi illo velit eos unde."}]}

request.description: Creates a new event. Only organizers and admins can create events.

variable.description: The ID of the event to update.

request.description:
Updates the specified event. Only the organizer or an admin can update an event.
You can modify a single field or multiple fields at once.
If some users have already paid for the event, only the name, description and the type can be modified.

variable.description: The ID of the event to delete.

request.description:
Deletes the specified event. If the event has attendees, they will be refunded.
If the event was supposed to start soon, only an admin can delete it.

response.body: {"message": "The deletion of this event is not allowed anymore!"}

item.name: User Management
item.description: Handles user-related operations, including viewing user profiles.

variable.description: The ID of the user whose profile to retrieve. If not specified, retrieves the authenticated user's profile.

request.description:
Displays the profile of a user. If no user is specified, it shows the authenticated user's profile.
(Only admins can see other users' profiles.)
